DataElement.preferredName: COVID-19 Vaccine Immunization Administered Vaccination Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text term used to describe type of COVID-19 Vaccine administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any vaccine that may prevent or treat coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Concepts.definition: Any vaccine that may prevent coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) that is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A technique used to cause an immune response that results in resistance to a specific disease, especially an infectious disease.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Inoculating an individual with either killed or live agents to prevent contraction of a disease.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Active immunization where vaccine is administered for therapeutic or preventive purposes. This can include administration of immunopotentiating agents such as BCG vaccine and Corynebacterium parvum as well as biological response modifiers such as interferons, interleukins, and colony-stimulating factors in order to directly stimulate the immune system.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Administration of vaccines to stimulate the host's immune response. This includes any preparation intended for active immunological prophylaxis or treatment._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._An American multinational pharmaceutical corporation headquartered in New York, NY. The company develops and produces medicines and vaccines for a wide range of medical disciplines.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Some people give similar reasons for not getting the covid-19 vaccine. Did you get the covid-19 vaccine, choose not to get it, or maybe you haven't decided yet?
